title: Exchange Podcast: Greg Fleming
description:
On the day Lehman Brothers went belly-up, Merrill Lynch sold itself to Bank of America. As president of the “Thundering Herd,” Fleming was the architect of that transaction. In conversation with Rob Cox, he defends the deal, reminisces on the crisis and discusses his new venture. See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.
